**Armor Alley: Remastered**
---

~~~

This is the distribution path for "compiled" (concatenated, minified etc.) HTML + JS + CSS assets used on the production site.

The game is currently built using `gulp-cli` (npm).

For notes on development, see [src/README.md](../src/README.md).
